<h1>TypeBox</h1>

<p>JSON Schema Type Builder with Static Type Resolution for TypeScript</p>

<a name="Install"></a>

## Install

#### Npm
```bash
$ npm install @sinclair/typebox --save
```

#### Deno
```typescript
import { Static, Type } from 'npm:@sinclair/typebox'
```

#### Esm

```typescript
import { Static, Type } from '
